// mperlikowski https://www.codechef.com/problems/R303

#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n, i, x[20], y[20];
		float p = 0.0;
		cin >> n;
		i = n;
		while(i--) cin >> x[i];
		i = n;
		while(i--) cin >> y[i];
		i = n;
		while(i--)
		{
			int j = i - 1;
			if(j < 0) j = n - 1;
			p += (x[j] - x[i]) * (y[j] + y[i]);
		}
		if(p < 0) p *= -1;
		p /= 2;
		cout << fixed << setprecision(1) << p << '\n';
	}
	return 0;
}
